data.message: Facebook needs to take the reporting seriously

replies.message: Hey Nick. Due to the volume of reports we receive, we're unable to reply to every spam incident. Rest assured that we are reading every inquiry we receive. Thank you for taking the time to improve the site. -Hailey

Hailey facebook continues to allow pages of hate speech and threats against cops or individuals which clearly violate the TOS and its constantly stated that it doesn't violate your terms until massive reports are done or media gets attention of it
